text: Take a selfie together and set it as your phone wallpaper for the day
Give each other a compliment you've never said before
Share your phone's photo gallery and explain your 3 favorite photos
Do a 30-second dance together to your favorite song
Make a secret handshake and perform it
Draw a quick portrait of each other (stick figures count!)
Share the last meme that made you laugh out loud
Plan your next date night together right now
Give each other a silly nickname that you'll use for the rest of the game
Share a funny or embarrassing story from your childhood
Look into each other's eyes for 30 seconds without speaking
Share three things you appreciate about your partner right now
Describe your favorite moment together in detail
Give your partner a gentle hand or shoulder massage for 1 minute
Tell your partner a dream you have about your future together
Share what you first noticed about your partner when you met
Write a short love note to your partner (text or paper)
Share the exact moment you knew you had deep feelings
Plan a surprise for your partner (even if it's small)
Say 'I love you' in a different language together
Share something you've never told anyone else
Discuss: What does trust mean to you in our relationship?
Share a fear or insecurity you have about the future
Discuss: How have we grown together since we first met?
Share something you need more of from your partner
Discuss: What values are most important to you in life?
Share a childhood experience that shaped who you are
Discuss: Where do you see us in 5 years?
Share a moment when you felt completely understood by your partner
Discuss: What does commitment mean to each of you?
